title: Plug in the Adapter
description: Connect the V.E.R.A adapter to a power source to begin setup.

title: Connect the Microphone
description: Attach the microphone to the designated port on the V.E.R.A device.

title: Activate V.E.R.A
description: Say 'Hello V.E.R.A' to activate. Ask your question, and V.E.R.A will respond.
